Class Date

java.lang.Object
com.example.javafx_clinicmanager.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
The Date Class models the Date system for the logic of the software
Author:
Deep Patel,Manan Patel

      Returns:

      public boolean isWeekend()
      Checks if the Date is a Weekend
      Returns:
      true if its Sunday or Saturday, false otherwise

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
